QuestData.Title: Pride of the Highborne
QuestData.Description: Ten thousand years ago...$B$BThe Highborne lived here in prosperity. We considered ourselves above the common ranks of the other night elves. With our every need met by magic and wealth, we led lives of indulgence and amusement. And greed...$B$BThe spirits you see here are overwhelmed with remorse and regret. Their anguish chains them here. If you wish to learn more of Kel'theril and Zin'malor, free them from their agony.
QuestData.CompletionText: Death is not always a relief.
QuestData.RewardText: The Crystal of Zin-Malor was stolen from a far-off temple without remorse. Its ability to control the arcane was too tempting, and when it was toyed with, its shattering cursed us all. Kel'theril suffered until the Sundering destroyed it for good.$B$BThe curse of Zin-Malor binds all who seek its power here. I was the first to fall to its temptation. Thousands of years later, our long lost descendants would be next...
